name: James Long Park Drop-off Site
materials: Plastic #1 (PETE); Plastic #2 (HDPE); Plastic #2 (Color HDPE); Plastic #3 (PVC); Plastic #4 (LDPE); Plastic #5 (Polypropylene); Plastic #6 (Polystyrene); Plastic #7; Aerosol Spray Cans; Aluminum Cans; Aluminum; Glass (Brown); Catalogs; Glass (Clear); Computer Paper; Glass (Green); Magazines; Milk Cartons; Paper (Mixed); Newspapers; Paperboard; Phone books; Tin or Steel Cans
notes:
Prince William County residents may recycle paper and food and beverage containers at the recycling drop-off trailers located around the County. Paper items must be kept separate from food and beverage containers.  Take plastic bags and corrugated boxes back home with you and do not leave any materials outside the bins. 

These locations are for residential recycling and should not be used by businesses.
